title: Mamotte Shugogetten 1-22 + OVA 1-8 Complete Eng Subs
description:
Hi all,

This is Mamotte Shugogetten and Denshin Mamotte Shugogetten also known as Protect Me, Heavenly Moon Guardian!

Complete Collection TV Series ep 1-22 and the OVA ep 1-8 English subs

Overview:
Mamotte Shugogetten TV series 1-22
Tasuke's parents are always travelling around the world, so he basically lives alone. His life seems pretty boring and careless until an artifact from China sent by his father makes a goddess appear. Shaolin Shugogetten is dedicated to protecting her master by summoning little spirits each with a unique power. If that isn't enough, a second goddess appears: Ruaan Keikounitten, who can bring objects alive. Her goal is to make Tasuke happy. Both goddesses aren't very bright and cause a lot of damage instead.

Overview:
Denshin Mamotte Shugogetten OVA 1-8
Tasuke-kun, an ordinary teenager who while living alone, finds himself in the company of two cute Shugotten (spirits) who have taken it upon themselves to ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã‹Å“protectÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã¢â€žÂ¢ him. In addition to living with the two spirits, Ruuan (the wood spirit) has somehow become his homeroom teacher at middle school and Shaorin (a spirit of the moon) is now a fellow student in his class. If only to complicate the situation, most of Tasuke's classmates have set their romantic interests on either him or his spirit companions. And then his father sends him a special gift
from China, which included a magic fan with yet another spirit. But Tasuke has always harbored special feelings for Shaorin and slowly their friendship grows amidst the strange magic and chaos of their lives.
